user_query: I'm organizing a team-building event for my company and I need some exciting activities. Can you recommend some invigorating games and provide inspiring quotes that promote teamwork and motivation? Also, find news articles about successful team-building events for additional inspiration.

TaskList.description: Research and recommend exciting team-building games.
Gather inspiring quotes that promote teamwork and motivation.
Find and summarize news articles about successful team-building events.
